directions: Mix soup, milk, peas, pimiento, tuna and noodles in 1 1/2-quart baking dish.
Mix bread crumbs with butter. Sprinkle on top. Bake 5 minutes or until hot.
ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  Campbell's® Condensed Cream of Celery Soup or Campbell's® Condensed 98% Fat Free Cream of Celery Soup
2 (6 ounce) cans tuna, drained and flaked
2 cups hot cooked medium egg noodles
title: Classic Tuna Noodle Casserole
